channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NC

item.title: Report X-2023100161
item.description:
Report X-2023100161

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-31T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-20
  • City: CHARLOTTE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PKG WAS DISCOVERED INSIDE OF A YELLOW HAZMAT TUB. AFTER PULLING IT OUT AND TRACKING IT, IT HAD BEEN MISSING AND WAS ALSO WET ONE ONE. SIDE. PKG WAS THEN SECURED AND PROCESSED AS A DAMAGE. DescribePack: UNSURE ON HOW THE PKG FOUND ITS WAY INTO THE YELLOW TUB ON ITS SIDE BUT ONE OF THE CAPS WAS LOOSE AND LEAKED INSIDE THE BOX. DurationRel: 24 and MitigateEffect: PKG TAKEN OUT OF YELLOW TUB AND PLACED UPRIGHT. PROCESSED AS A DAMAGE

item.title: Report X-2023100139
item.description:
Report X-2023100139

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-31T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-20
  • City: DURHAM
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The damaged package was placed in a hazardous materials tote and taken to the hazardous materials staging area away from personnel and other packages. DescribePack: Upon inspection it was noted that the hydrochloric acid wore down the glass bottle causing it to crack and leak the contents. The only packaging was some molded pulp packaging. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The damaged package was placed in a hazardous materials drum awaiting disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023091044

X-2023091044 SequenceEvent: box showed signs of internal leakage, upon opening caps were loose DescribePack: loose caps DurationRel: -1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately place in a lined tote and taken to hazmat processing area. 2. X-2023091045 SequenceEvent: package showed signs of internal leakage and upon opening caps were loose DescribePack: loose caps DurationRel: -1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately place in a lined tote and taken to hazmat processing area. 3.
